pages.text: $(li)The Farmer is a expert of the agriculture.$(br)$(li)It will trade you Pumpkin Pie, Gooseberry Jam Cookies, Bananas, Passionfruit, Banana Cakes, Suspicious Stew, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/golden_carrot)Golden Carrots$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/glistering_melon_slice)Glistering Melon Slice$(/l) for $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Farmer profession if is near a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l).
